class_notes: Fulfills the independent study requirement for ENVS majors. Applications to enroll are due no later than June 1. Interested students should contact Leah Thomas (leah.thomas@emory.edu) or check our website (envs.emory.edu) for more information.
course_description: ENVS permission and internship pre-approval required. Credit for working as an intern in environmentally-related, approved settings. Fulfills ENVS Independent Study requirement (4 credit hours).
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 2949, Section #: 1, Type: DIS, Campus: ATL, Meets: M 6-7:15p, Instructor: T. Yandle, Status: Closed
